SEARCH
Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class handles the business logic and serves as an intermediary between the user interface and the data access objects.

    • checkUserEPass

      public int checkUserEPass(String Username, String Password)
      Checks the priority of a user based on the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      Username - The username of the user.
      Password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the user priority (1 for admin, 2 for regular user, -1 for user not found).

      Parameters:

      Password - The password of the new user.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during user insertion.

      public ArrayList<Calciatori> visualizzaCalciatori(String nome)
      Retrieves a list of football players based on the provided name.
      Parameters:
      nome - The name used as a filter for retrieving players.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing Calciatori objects representing the football players matching the provided name.

    • inserisciSponsorSecondario

      public void inserisciSponsorSecondario(String nomeSquadra, String nomeSponsor) throws SQLException
      Inserts a secondary sponsor for a given team.
      Parameters:
      nomeSquadra - The name of the team.
      nomeSponsor - The name of the secondary sponsor.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the insertion of the secondary sponsor.

    • inserisci_Calc_Ruolo_Spon_Squa_Mil

      public void inserisci_Calc_Ruolo_Spon_Squa_Mil(String nome, String cognome, String nazion, Date dataNascita, Optional<Date> dataRitiro, String piedePR, String ruoli, String nomeSponsor, String nomeSquadra, String nazSquadra, Date dataInizio, Optional<Date> dataFine, int tiriSegnati, int partiteGiocate, String goalSubiti) throws SQLException
      Inserts player information along with playing position, sponsorship, and team details.
      Parameters:
      nome - The first name of the player.
      cognome - The last name of the player.
      nazion - The nationality of the player.
      dataNascita - The date of birth of the player.
      dataRitiro - The optional date of retirement of the player.
      piedePR - The preferred foot of the player.
      ruoli - The playing position(s) of the player.
      nomeSponsor - The name of the sponsor associated with the player.
      nomeSquadra - The name of the team the player belongs to.
      nazSquadra - The nationality of the team.
      dataInizio - The start date of the player's association with the team.
      dataFine - The optional end date of the player's association with the team.
      tiriSegnati - The number of goals scored by the player.
      partiteGiocate - The number of matches played by the player.
      goalSubiti - The number of goals conceded by the player (for goalkeepers).
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the insertion process.

    • inserisciSquadra

      public void inserisciSquadra(String nomeSquadra, String nomeSponsor, String nazione) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new team with the given name, primary sponsor, and nationality.
      Parameters:
      nomeSquadra - The name of the team.
      nomeSponsor - The name of the primary sponsor.
      nazione - The nationality of the team.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the insertion of the team.

    • prendiSquadreDalDB

      public String prendiSquadreDalDB() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a string representation of teams from the database.
      Returns:
      A String containing information about teams retrieved from the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the retrieval process.

    • checkMilitanza

      public int checkMilitanza(String dataN, String dataI, String dataF)
      Checks the eligibility of a player's association with a team based on birthdate, start date, and end date.
      Parameters:
      dataN - The player's date of birth.
      dataI - The start date of the player's association with the team.
      dataF - The optional end date of the player's association with the team.
      Returns:
      An integer code indicating the result of the eligibility check. 0 - Eligible, 1 - Invalid end date month, 2 - End date not after start date, 3 - Invalid start date month, 4 - Insufficient age at the start date.

    • inserisciCompetizione

      public void inserisciCompetizione(String nomeComp, Integer annoInizio, String nazione, String tipo, String nomeTrofeo, Integer annoFine) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new competition with the given details.
      Parameters:
      nomeComp - The name of the competition.
      annoInizio - The starting year of the competition.
      nazione - The nationality of the competition.
      tipo - The type of the competition.
      nomeTrofeo - The name of the trophy associated with the competition.
      annoFine - The ending year of the competition.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the insertion of the competition.

    • prendiRuoloCalciatoreFacile

      public boolean prendiRuoloCalciatoreFacile(String nome, String cognome)
      Checks if a football player with the given name and surname has an easily determinable playing position.
      Parameters:
      nome - The first name of the player.
      cognome - The last name of the player.
      Returns:
      true if the playing position is easily determinable, false otherwise.

    • prendiRuoloCalciatoreDifficile

      public boolean prendiRuoloCalciatoreDifficile(String nome, String cognome, String nazione, Date nascita)
      Checks if a football player with the given name, surname, nationality, and date of birth has a determinable playing position.
      Parameters:
      nome - The first name of the player.
      cognome - The last name of the player.
      nazione - The nationality of the player.
      nascita - The date of birth of the player.
      Returns:
      true if the playing position is determinable, false otherwise.

    • getIDGiocatore

      public String getIDGiocatore(String nome, String cognome, String nazione, Date nascita)
      Retrieves the ID of a football player with the given name, surname, nationality, and date of birth.
      Parameters:
      nome - The first name of the player.
      cognome - The last name of the player.
      nazione - The nationality of the player.
      nascita - The date of birth of the player.
      Returns:
      The ID of the football player.

    • inserisciMilitanza

      public void inserisciMilitanza(String idGiocatore, Optional<Date> dataFineExMilitanzaDate, Date dataInizioNuovaMilitanzaDate, Optional<Date> dataFineNuovaMilitanzaDate, String squadra, int tiriSegnatiInt, int partiteGiocateInt, String goalSubitiInt) throws SQLException
      Inserts player affiliation details, including previous and new memberships.
      Parameters:
      idGiocatore - The ID of the player.
      dataFineExMilitanzaDate - The optional end date of the player's previous affiliation.
      dataInizioNuovaMilitanzaDate - The start date of the player's new affiliation.
      dataFineNuovaMilitanzaDate - The optional end date of the player's new affiliation.
      squadra - The team the player is affiliated with.
      tiriSegnatiInt - The number of goals scored by the player.
      partiteGiocateInt - The number of matches played by the player.
      goalSubitiInt - The number of goals conceded by the player (for goalkeepers).
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during the insertion process.
